response.job_title: Chemical engineer | MSc. Sanitary engineering | Process engineer | Wastewater treatment | Process Design | Sustainable business
response.summary:
Chemical engineer with a master's degree in urban water and sanitation. Passionate about water treatment and sustainable processes; as well as the design of water treatment projects for the industry and the needs of vulnerable communities.

Extensive knowledge in electrochemistry, biological processes, advanced oxidation processes, reverse osmosis and conventional technologies for water treatment.

Experience in research and experimentation on a laboratory and pilot scale. I did my research internship at Biothane-Veolia in a continuous system (EGSB-MBBR) for the treatment of water from the plasticizer industry.

I also have experience in physicochemical analysis of waste and drinking water quality acquired working as an analyst for the environmental engineering laboratory of the National University of Colombia.
response.skills: Engineering Design, BioWin, Ingeniería medioambiental, Ingeniería química, Tratamiento de aguas, Procesos avanzados de oxidación, Ingeniería de procesos, Aptitudes de laboratorio, Matlab, Aspen HYSYS, Microsoft Office, Trabajo en equipo, Aptitudes de organización, Spanish, English, Aspen Plus, Investigación, Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios, Optimización de procesos, Tratamiento de aguas residuales

profile_positions.description: Wastewater treatment from a chemical industry using high-rate anaerobic bioreactors and aerobic post-treatment.
profile_positions.title: Research Intern

profile_positions.description: Encargado de manejo y revisión de proyecto sostenibles, diseño de medición de impacto, creación de informes de sostenibilidad y asesoría a negocios triple impacto.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Physicochemical analyst for the environmental engineering laboratory of the National University, determining water quality parameters by means of standard methods.
profile_positions.title: Water quality analyst

profile_positions.description: Researcher in the process of electrocoagulation for the treatment of produced wastewater from the hydrocarbon industry within the framework of the MEGIA project.
profile_positions.title: Research assistant

education.degree_name: Online course on desalination and membrane technology

company.name: BIOTHANE Leading Anaerobic Technologies
company.description:
Your partner for industrial wastewater treatment and energy recovery!

Biothane is one of the world's leading companies in the field of biological treatment of industrial wastewater. We have a portfolio of processes and technologies that can be applied in a vast variety of sectors and installations.

With more than 670 installations constructed in over 40 countries around the globe, Biothane demonstrates its outstanding competency in the fields of anaerobic and aerobic wastewater treatment

Biothane is the anaerobic treatment brand of Veolia Water Technologies. With its presence in more than 50 countries, Veolia Water Technologies is a world leader in water and wastewater treatment for industry and municipalities. The portfolio embraces over 250 proprietary technologies.
